definition: school for cadres/May 7 Cadre School 五七幹校|五七干校
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
May 7 Cadre School (forcing educated people into re-education and peasant labor during Cultural Revolution)/abbr. for 五七幹部學校|五七干部学校[wu3 qi1 gan4 bu4 xue2 xiao4]

sentences.english: Dry tuck-pointing blades are used on hand-held circular saws and small, right angle grinders.
sentences.chinese: 幹校內指向刀片用於手持圓鋸和小磨直角。

sentences.english: Having finished A Cadre School Life: Six Chapters, Yang Jiang sent me the script.
sentences.chinese: 楊絳寫完《幹校六記》，把稿子給我看了一遍。
